## 1.0 Project Initiation  

### 1.1 Project Charter Development  
| **WBS Code**       | 1.1                                      |
|---------------------|------------------------------------------|
| **Work Package Name** | Project Charter Development           |
| **Description**     | Develop the PMBOK-compliant project charter, outlining objectives, scope, stakeholders, constraints, and assumptions. |
| **Responsible**     | Project Manager                         |
| **Resources**       | Business Analyst, Stakeholders          |
| **Estimated Duration** | 5 days                               |
| **Acceptance Criteria** | Project charter approved by key stakeholders. |
| **Dependencies**    | None                                    |
| **Quality Requirements** | Must follow PMBOK guidelines and include all required elements. |
| **Assumptions**     | Stakeholders are available for timely feedback. |
| **Constraints**     | Limited time for stakeholder interviews. |

## 2.0 Project Planning  

### 2.1 Scope Management Plan  
| **WBS Code**       | 2.1                                      |
|---------------------|------------------------------------------|
| **Work Package Name** | Scope Management Plan                |
| **Description**     | Create a detailed plan for defining, validating, and controlling project scope. |
| **Responsible**     | Business Analyst                       |
| **Resources**       | Stakeholder Register, Project Charter   |
| **Estimated Duration** | 3 days                               |
| **Acceptance Criteria** | Approved scope management plan.     |
| **Dependencies**    | Completion of Project Charter           |
| **Quality Requirements** | Must include scope definition processes, validation procedures, and change control mechanisms. |
| **Assumptions**     | Stakeholders provide clear requirements. |
| **Constraints**     | Scope must align with organizational policies. |

### 2.2 Requirements Management Plan  
| **WBS Code**       | 2.2                                      |
|---------------------|------------------------------------------|
| **Work Package Name** | Requirements Management Plan          |
| **Description**     | Develop a plan for gathering, analyzing, documenting, and managing requirements. |
| **Responsible**     | Business Analyst                       |
| **Resources**       | Stakeholder Register, Scope Management Plan |
| **Estimated Duration** | 4 days                               |
| **Acceptance Criteria** | Approved requirements management plan. |
| **Dependencies**    | Stakeholder Register                   |
| **Quality Requirements** | Must follow PMBOK standards, ensuring traceability of requirements. |
| **Assumptions**     | Requirements can be gathered within the planned timeframe. |
| **Constraints**     | Limited availability of stakeholders for interviews. |

## 3.0 Development  

### 3.1 System Architecture Design  
| **WBS Code**       | 3.1                                      |
|---------------------|------------------------------------------|
| **Work Package Name** | System Architecture Design            |
| **Description**     | Design the system architecture for the Requirements Gathering Agent tool, including context management and AI integration. |
| **Responsible**     | Lead Developer                         |
| **Resources**       | Architecture Documentation, AI APIs     |
| **Estimated Duration** | 10 days                              |
| **Acceptance Criteria** | Approved architecture documentation by the technical team. |
| **Dependencies**    | Requirements Management Plan            |
| **Quality Requirements** | Must ensure scalability, modularity, and compliance with design best practices. |
| **Assumptions**     | All necessary APIs are available for integration. |
| **Constraints**     | Limited time for architecture validation. |

### 3.2 Document Generation Engine Development  
| **WBS Code**       | 3.2                                      |
|---------------------|------------------------------------------|
| **Work Package Name** | Document Generation Engine           |
| **Description**     | Implement the engine for generating PMBOK-compliant documents using predefined templates and AI models. |
| **Responsible**     | Development Team                       |
| **Resources**       | TypeScript, Node.js, AI APIs            |
| **Estimated Duration** | 15 days                              |
| **Acceptance Criteria** | Functional document generation engine passes unit tests. |
| **Dependencies**    | System Architecture Design             |
| **Quality Requirements** | Must adhere to PMBOK document standards and produce consistent output. |
| **Assumptions**     | Templates are finalized before implementation begins. |
| **Constraints**     | Limited availability of AI providers for testing. |

## 4.0 Testing  

### 4.1 Unit Testing  
| **WBS Code**       | 4.1                                      |
|---------------------|------------------------------------------|
| **Work Package Name** | Unit Testing                          |
| **Description**     | Conduct unit testing for all modules, ensuring functionality and compatibility. |
| **Responsible**     | QA Team                                |
| **Resources**       | Jest, TypeScript                       |
| **Estimated Duration** | 7 days                               |
| **Acceptance Criteria** | All modules pass unit tests with no critical bugs. |
| **Dependencies**    | Completion of Development Phase         |
| **Quality Requirements** | Must cover at least 90% code coverage. |
| **Assumptions**     | Development team resolves issues promptly. |
| **Constraints**     | Limited time for testing iterations. |

### 4.2 Integration Testing  
| **WBS Code**       | 4.2                                      |
|---------------------|------------------------------------------|
| **Work Package Name** | Integration Testing                   |
| **Description**     | Validate the integration between system components and AI providers. |
| **Responsible**     | QA Team                                |
| **Resources**       | Testing Framework, AI APIs              |
| **Estimated Duration** | 10 days                              |
| **Acceptance Criteria** | System components function seamlessly together. |
| **Dependencies**    | Unit Testing                           |
| **Quality Requirements** | Must ensure API reliability and error handling. |
| **Assumptions**     | AI providers remain stable during testing. |
| **Constraints**     | Limited access to production-like environments. |

### 5.1 Deployment Preparation

|---------------------|------------------------------------------|
| **Work Package Name** | Deployment Preparation                |
| **Description**     | Prepare the environment, documentation, and configurations for deployment. |

| **Estimated Duration** | 5 days                               |
| **Acceptance Criteria** | Deployment checklist completed and approved. |
| **Dependencies**    | Integration Testing                    |
| **Quality Requirements** | Must follow deployment best practices. |
| **Assumptions**     | Deployment scripts are functional and validated. |
| **Constraints**     | Limited downtime allowed during deployment. |

### 5.2 Deployment Execution  
| **WBS Code**       | 5.2                                      |
|---------------------|------------------------------------------|
| **Work Package Name** | Deployment Execution                  |
| **Description**     | Deploy the Requirements Gathering Agent to production. |
| **Responsible**     | DevOps Team                            |
| **Resources**       | Production Environment, Deployment Scripts |
| **Estimated Duration** | 1 day                                |
| **Acceptance Criteria** | Deployed system functions correctly in production. |
| **Dependencies**    | Deployment Preparation                 |
| **Quality Requirements** | Must ensure zero critical issues post-deployment. |
| **Assumptions**     | Production environment is stable.       |
| **Constraints**     | Deployment must occur during approved windows. |

## 6.0 Support and Maintenance  

### 6.1 User Support  
| **WBS Code**       | 6.1                                      |
|---------------------|------------------------------------------|
| **Work Package Name** | User Support                          |
| **Description**     | Provide support to users for issues related to the Requirements Gathering Agent. |
| **Responsible**     | Support Team                           |
| **Resources**       | Helpdesk, Documentation                |
| **Estimated Duration** | Ongoing                              |
| **Acceptance Criteria** | User issues resolved within SLA timelines. |
| **Dependencies**    | Deployment Execution                   |
| **Quality Requirements** | Must maintain a high user satisfaction score. |
| **Assumptions**     | Users provide clear issue descriptions. |
| **Constraints**     | Limited support staff availability.     |

### 6.2 Maintenance and Updates  
| **WBS Code**       | 6.2                                      |
|---------------------|------------------------------------------|
| **Work Package Name** | Maintenance and Updates               |
| **Description**     | Regular updates to address bugs, security patches, and feature enhancements. |
| **Responsible**     | Development Team                       |
| **Resources**       | Source Code, Issue Tracker              |
| **Estimated Duration** | Ongoing                              |
| **Acceptance Criteria** | Updates applied with minimal disruption to users. |
